Interface RotatableGizmoPhysics

All Superinterfaces:
GizmoPhysics, PiecePhysics
All Known Subinterfaces:
RotatableGizmo
All Known Implementing Classes:
Flipper3D
public interface RotatableGizmoPhysics
extends GizmoPhysics

RotatableGizmoPhysics - represents all gizmos that are rotable about a pivot point

Author:
Ragu Vijaykumar
